channel.title: About me on Matti Tuomikoski
channel.description: Recent content in About me on Matti Tuomikoski

item.description: Student projects Spring 2020: Visim physics (Wordpress & PHP) I was part of five-member team creating a new Wordpress site for Visim physics. Visim creates and sells instructional videos for physics exercises and demonstrations to schools. The site included a secured area where customers with login can access the exercises and videos served from Vimeo. The project used various Wordpress plugins but also required some custom PHP to enable the needed functionality.
